ing: 2 pounds sausages, sliced into coin size pieces
1 (28 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
des: "This firehouse favorite is both hearty and light with great flavor.  Your family will love it."
ins: In a large pot, melt butter and brown the sausage slices; drain fat.  Stir flour into sausage then mix in chicken broth, tomatoes, basil and oregano; bring to boil.  Lower heat and simmer approximately 20 minutes or until sausage is fully cooked. Add zucchini slices and pasta.  Continue cooking until zucchini and pasta are done.
